questions.question: A popular evaluation metric used for binary classification problems.
An evaluation metric that measures the proportion of true positive predictions.
An evaluation metric that measures the ability to identify true positive cases.
An evaluation metric that quantifies the overall performance of a model.
An evaluation metric used for ranking and relevance-based tasks.
An evaluation metric that accounts for false positives and false negatives.
An evaluation metric that considers both precision and recall.
An evaluation metric used in clustering to measure the similarity within clusters.
